ygData.subject: Re: DE or Troll/OGRE
ygData.msgSnippet: That is completly false Dark Elves make the better casters but it doesn t matter because your best offensive spells are level 12 and 16 Necromancer. I have two
ygData.messageBody: That is completly false Dark Elves make the better casters but it doesn't matter because your best offensive spells are level 12 and 16 Necromancer. I have two level 30 SK friends. One is human and one is Ogre and the Ogre is the better SK. It doesn't matter if SK's are great spell casters they are tanks. All they need is to be able to get off one or two dots then finish them off through melee. SK's are 3/4 warrior and 1/4 necro, not 3/4 necro and 1/4 warriors. DE's do not make the best Shadow Knights Ogres do because of the higher intell over trolls and better stength and stamina.
